downloadTitle: Designing Applications using CAB & the Smart Client Software Factory
downloadDescription: This white paper, originally created for RACON Software GmbH, which is a Software house of the Raiffeisen Banking Group in Austria and provides architectural guidance for designing and implementing composite smart clients based on the Composite UI Application Block and the Smart Client Software Factory from the Microsoft patterns & practices group.
detailsSection: This white paper was created to support the architects and lead developers of RACON Software GmbH for designing and implementing a new bank desktop composite client application based on the Composite UI Application Block and the Smart Client Software Factory. It documents real world experiences using these framework and tools.
systemRequirementsSection: Adobe Reader or other PDF Viewer
installInstructionSection: Click the download link and view the pdf file using Adobe Reader 5.0 or later.
